trans-unit.source: Represents a real-time full-duplex connection between a web server and a client in an ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: 代表 web server ASP.NET 應用程式中的用戶端之間的即時全雙工連接。

trans-unit.source: Cancels any pending I/O operations on the <xref href="System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket"></xref> object and sets the state of the object so that it cannot be used to start additional I/O operations.
trans-unit.target: 取消任何暫止 I/O 作業上<xref href="System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket"></xref>物件，並設定物件的狀態，讓它無法用來啟動其他 I/O 作業。

trans-unit.source: After the Abort method has been called, you can still access properties and methods that do not involve I/O operations.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫 Abort 方法之後，您仍然可以存取不包括 I/O 作業的屬性和方法。

trans-unit.source: The object was previously disposed.
Sends an asynchronous message to a client to close the connection.
trans-unit.target: 將非同步訊息傳送至用戶端可以關閉連接。

trans-unit.source: If the server initiates the request to close the connection, the method waits for the client to acknowledge the request before it returns.
trans-unit.target: 如果伺服器啟動關閉的連線要求，方法會等候認可要求，再傳回用戶端。

trans-unit.source: You can use the CloseAsync and <xref:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket.CloseOutputAsync%2A> methods for both client-initiated and server-initiated requests to close an <xref:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket> connection.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 CloseAsync 和<xref:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket.CloseOutputAsync%2A>方法和用戶端起始伺服器起始的要求，以關閉<xref:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket>連線。</xref:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket> </xref:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket.CloseOutputAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: The two methods handle client-initiated requests in the same way: After the client sends a message to the server to close the connection, the server calls one of these methods and sends an acknowledgment to the client, and then the method returns.
trans-unit.target: 兩個方法會處理用戶端起始的要求相同的方式︰ 用戶端傳送訊息至伺服器，以關閉連線後，在伺服器呼叫這些方法的其中一個，並將通知傳送至用戶端，該方法會傳回。

trans-unit.source: For server-initiated requests, the two methods work differently.
trans-unit.target: 對於伺服器起始的要求，這兩個方法的運作方式不同。

trans-unit.source: The CloseAsync method sends a message to the client to close the connection, waits for a response, and then returns.
trans-unit.target: CloseAsync 方法會傳送訊息至用戶端，關閉連線，等候回應，，然後傳回。

trans-unit.source: The server does not wait for any additional data sent by the client.
trans-unit.target: 伺服器不會等候用戶端傳送的任何其他資料。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, the <xref:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket.CloseOutputAsync%2A> method sends a message to the client to close the connection and returns without waiting for a response.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，<xref:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket.CloseOutputAsync%2A>方法將訊息傳送給用戶端，關閉連接，並傳回而不等待回應。</xref:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket.CloseOutputAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: After the method returns, you can call the <xref:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket.ReceiveAsync%2A> method and handle either additional data or the acknowledgment that the client sends.
trans-unit.target: 方法會傳回之後，您可以呼叫<xref:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket.ReceiveAsync%2A>方法並處理額外的資料或用戶端傳送的通知。</xref:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket.ReceiveAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: The status code of the close operation.
The status message of the close operation.
The object that cancels a pending operation.
A reference to the operation.
The <xref href="System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket"></xref> object was previously disposed.
The <xref href="System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket"></xref> object is in an aborted state.
-or- Sending operations are unavailable.
-or- Receiving operations are unavailable.
Sends an asynchronous message to a client to close the connection.
trans-unit.target: 將非同步訊息傳送至用戶端可以關閉連接。

trans-unit.source: If the server initiates the request to close the connection, the method returns without waiting for a response.
trans-unit.target: 如果伺服器啟動關閉的連線要求，方法會傳回而不等候回應。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket.CloseAsync%2A> and CloseOutputAsync methods for both client-initiated and server-initiated requests to close an <xref:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket> connection.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket.CloseAsync%2A>和 CloseOutputAsync 方法，同時用戶端起始和伺服器起始的要求，以關閉<xref:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket>連線。</xref:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket> </xref:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket.CloseAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: The two methods handle client-initiated requests in the same way: After the client sends a message to the server to close the connection, the server calls one of these methods and sends an acknowledgment to the client, and then the method returns.
trans-unit.target: 兩個方法會處理用戶端起始的要求相同的方式︰ 用戶端傳送訊息至伺服器，以關閉連線後，在伺服器呼叫這些方法的其中一個，並將通知傳送至用戶端，該方法會傳回。

trans-unit.source: For server-initiated requests, the two methods work differently.
trans-unit.target: 對於伺服器起始的要求，這兩個方法的運作方式不同。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket.CloseAsync%2A> method sends a message to the client to close the connection, waits for a response, and then returns.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket.CloseAsync%2A>方法將訊息傳送給用戶端，關閉連線、 等候回應，，然後傳回。</xref:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket.CloseAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: The server does not wait for any additional data sent by the client.
trans-unit.target: 伺服器不會等候用戶端傳送的任何其他資料。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, the CloseOutputAsync method sends a message to the client to close the connection and returns without waiting for a response.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，CloseOutputAsync 方法將訊息傳送給用戶端，關閉連接，並傳回而不等待回應。

trans-unit.source: After the method returns, you can call the <xref:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket.ReceiveAsync%2A> method and handle either additional data or the acknowledgment that the client sends.
trans-unit.target: 方法會傳回之後，您可以呼叫<xref:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket.ReceiveAsync%2A>方法並處理額外的資料或用戶端傳送的通知。</xref:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket.ReceiveAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: The status code of the close operation.
The status message of the close operation.
The object that cancels a pending operation.
A reference to the operation.
The object was previously disposed.
The <xref href="System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket"></xref> object is in an aborted state.
-or- Sending operations are unavailable.
Gets a status code that indicates why an <xref href="System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket"></xref> object was closed.
trans-unit.target: 取得指出原因的狀態碼<xref href="System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket"></xref>物件已關閉。

trans-unit.source: The status code.
The object was previously disposed.
Gets a status message that explains why an <xref href="System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket"></xref> object was closed.
trans-unit.target: 取得解釋為什麼的狀態訊息<xref href="System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket"></xref>物件已關閉。

trans-unit.source: The status message.
The object was previously disposed.
Releases all resources used by an <xref href="System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 所使用的資源全部釋出<xref href="System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET automatically calls the Dispose method on a <xref:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket> object to release any resources that remain after your code has finished executing.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 會自動呼叫 Dispose 方法上<xref:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket>物件釋放您的程式碼完成之後維持執行的任何資源。</xref:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket>

trans-unit.source: Receives a single message fragment from a remote client.
trans-unit.target: 從遠端用戶端接收單一訊息片段。

trans-unit.source: The array that contains the message data.
The object that cancels a pending operation.
A reference to the task of receiving a message.
trans-unit.target: 接收訊息的工作的參考。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket"></xref> object was previously disposed.
The <xref href="System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket"></xref> object is in an aborted state.
-or- Receiving operations are unavailable.
Sends a single message fragment to a remote client.
trans-unit.target: 將單一訊息片段傳送至遠端用戶端。

trans-unit.source: The array that contains the message data.
The message type.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that a fragment is the end of a complete message; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>表示片段是完整的訊息; 結尾否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The object that cancels a pending operation.
A reference to the task of sending a message.
trans-unit.target: 傳送訊息的工作的參考。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket"></xref> object is disposed.
The <xref href="System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket"></xref> object is in an aborted state.
-or- Sending operations are unavailable.
Gets a value that indicates the open or closed state of an <xref href="System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出已開啟或關閉的狀態<xref href="System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The current state.
The object was previously disposed.
Gets the name of an application-specific protocol that a remote client and a server can use to exchange data over an <xref href="System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket"></xref> connection.
trans-unit.target: 取得遠端用戶端和伺服器可用來交換資料的應用程式專屬通訊協定名稱<xref href="System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket"></xref>連線。

trans-unit.source: The name of the protocol.
The object was previously disposed.
